text: united in marriage with fellow childhood Priest of Ur contactee, CDT-Plate Speaker and EOMC Eckar (6th-Degree MC Ordinate Minister) Rev. Michael Deane M.Sc. of England, founder of the Azurite Temple UK and Europe. Together Michael, Ashayana and the Eieyani Priests continue the work of CDT-Plate translation and PSCs, and are presently preparing a Personal-Planetary Studies Masters Course in Spiritual Development, DNA Bio-Regenesis, Merkaba and Advanced Planetary Templar Mechanics. The Masters Course will be offered as private classes in Florida and on video through the Azurite Temples and Kathara Healing Institute in 2002. Currently residing in Florida, Michael, Ashayana and Ministers of the Azurite Temples offer non- denominational community support services of Ministerial Ordinations, Baptisms and Marriages in the ancient Law of One Melchizedek Cloister “Inner Christ” spiritual tradition. They periodically offer, Spiritual Development, Bio-Regenesis, Kathara Healing and Planetary Healing workshops at home and abroad. In order to make the CDT-Plate teachings more easily available to the public, in January 2001 Michael, Ashayana and the staff of Azurite Temple began organization of the Azurite Educational Resource Library correspondence programs,
